control.description-key: PowerApps Component Framework control (PCF) that allows users to see records in a kanban view format.

property.name: successMessage
property.description-key: Message displayed when a record is successfully moved or updated. Use {columnName} as a placeholder to dynamically insert the column name.

property.name: viewByLabel
property.description-key: Label text for the View by dropdown in the Kanban. If not set, the default is View by.

property.name: errorMessage
property.description-key: Message shown when a record update fails

property.name: savingText
property.description-key: Text shown while data is saving

property.name: emptyColumnText
property.description-key: Text shown when a kanban column has no records

property.name: filteredBusinessProcessFlows
property.description-key: Provide an array of strings with the business process flow names to filter out.

property.name: hideViewBy
property.display-name-key: Hide View By if default View By set?

property.name: notificationPosition
property.description-key: Choose the position where the toast message should appear
